description.p: The Platform Explorer addon provides a Web interface and a Java API to browse any Nuxeo distribution: bundled groups (Maven group or artificial grouping), bundles, components, services, extension points, operations and contributions. It is the addon used behind http://explorer.nuxeo.com. It can be seen as a tool to generate documentation automatically. It can be particularly useful if you are a software vendor that builds a solution on top of the Nuxeo Platform.
